TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDeletedEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当单击控件中的 "删除" 按钮（其 `CommandName` 属性设置为 "Delete"）时， 控件将引发 事件，但在 控件删除记录后。The control raises the event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the control deletes the record. 这使您可以提供一个事件处理程序，以便在每次发生此事件时执行自定义例程，如检查删除操作的结果。This allows you to provide an event handler that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs. 将 对象传递到事件处理程序，该处理程序允许您确定受影响的记录数以及可能已发生的任何异常。A object is passed to the event handler, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred. 若要确定受删除操作影响的记录数，请使用 属性。To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the property. 使用 属性来确定是否发生了异常。Use the property to determine whether any exceptions occurred. 还可以通过设置 属性，指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler by setting the property. 如果要访问已删除记录的键字段和非键字段的名称/值对，请分别使用 "" 和 "" 属性。If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the and properties, respectively. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用传递到 事件的事件处理程序的 对象来确定删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event handler for the event to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化 类的新实例。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示了 实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |属性Property|初始值Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`affectedRows` 参数的值。The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| ||`e` 参数中包含的 。The contained in the `e` parameter.| ||初始化为 `false`。Initialized to `false`.| > [!NOTE] > 此构造函数主要由控件开发人员在引发事件时使用。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when raising events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定受删除操作影响的行数。Use the property to determine the number of rows affected by the delete operation. 此值通常用于验证是否已删除适当数量的行。This value is commonly used to verify that the appropriate number of rows was deleted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定受删除操作影响的记录数。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the number of records affected by a delete operation. summary.span: 获取在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果引发）。

span.span: Gets the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示删除操作过程中引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was raised during the delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来确定在删除操作过程中引发的异常（如果有）。Use the property to determine the exception (if any) that was raised during the delete operation. 如果未引发异常，此属性将返回 `null`。If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果引发了异常，并且您决定在事件处理程序中处理异常，请确保将 属性设置为 `true`;否则，异常将传递到调用堆栈上的下一方法以进行处理。If an exception was raised and you decide to handle the exception in the event handler, be sure to set the property to `true`; otherwise, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定在删除操作过程中是否发生了异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExceptionHandled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在事件处理程序中处理了删除操作中引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.

value.span: 如果异常已在事件处理程序中得到处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在删除操作过程中引发了异常，则使用 属性指示是否已在事件处理程序中处理异常。When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the property to indicate whether the exception was handled in the event handler. 如果将此属性设置为 "`true`"，则会将该异常视为已处理的异常，并且不会在调用堆栈中向上传递。When this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not passed further up the call stack. 如果将此属性设置为 `false`，则异常将传递到调用堆栈上的下一方法以进行处理。If this property is set to `false`, the exception is passed to the next method on the call stack for handling. 若要确定引发的异常，请使用 属性。To determine which exception was raised, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来指示在事件处理程序中已处理异常。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsInline/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargsinlinevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As IOrderedDictionary

summary.span: 获取键字段名称/值对的有序字典，其中包含已删除项的键字段的名称和值。

span.span: Gets an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs that contains the names and values of the key fields of the deleted items.

value.span: 一个 ，包含用于匹配要删除的项的键字段名称/值对的有序字典。

span.span: An that contains an ordered dictionary of key field name/value pairs used to match the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以访问要删除的记录的键字段的值。Use the property to access the values of the key fields for the record to delete. 例如，您可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性仅包含键字段。This property contains only the key fields. 若要访问非键字段，请使用 属性。To access the non-key fields, use the property. 属性返回一个实现 接口的对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含 对象，这些对象表示要删除的记录的键字段。The object contains objects that represent the key fields of the record to delete. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用 对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问已删除记录的键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含要删除的项的非键字段名称/值对的字典。

span.span: Gets a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

value.span: 包含要删除项的非键字段名称/值对的字典的 。

span.span: A that contains a dictionary of the non-key field name/value pairs for the item to delete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可以访问要删除的记录的非键字段值。Use the property to access the values of the non-key fields for the record to delete. 例如，您可以使用这些值来记录已删除的记录。For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted records. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不包含记录的键字段。This property does not contain the key fields for the record. 若要访问密钥字段，请使用 属性。To access the key fields, use the property. 属性返回实现 接口的 对象。The property returns an object that implements the interface. 对象包含表示要删除的记录的非键字段 对象。The object contains objects that represent the non-key fields of the record to delete. > [!NOTE] > 作为快捷方式，还可以使用 对象的索引器直接访问字段值。As a shortcut, you can also use the indexer of the object to access the field values directly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性访问已删除记录的非键字段的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to access the values of the non-key fields of a deleted record. [!code-aspx-csharp[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/CS/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeyscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DetailsViewDeletedEventArgsKeys/VB/detailsviewdeletedeventargskeysvb.aspx#1)]
